root.Status: New/Open/Active (Depends on the Tool you are using)
root.Description: Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new the user, hence unable to create a new user in the application
root.Bug_Name: Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new user.
root.Bug_ID: (It will be automatically created by the BUG Tracking tool once you save this bug)
root.Steps_to_Reproduce: Navigate to the Users Menu -> New User
Filled out all the user information fields
Seen an error page “ORA1090 Exception: Insert values Error…”
See the attached logs for more information (Attach more logs related to the bug..IF any)
Also see the attached screenshot of the error page
root.Expected_Result: On clicking the SAVE button, you should be prompted to a successful message “New User has been created successfully”.
